title.rendered: Thanksgiving Hours + Christmas Gift Ideas + Training for Franchises!

content.rendered:
Training for the New Walls of Books Stores!

Here’s a peek at the training happening at our Corporate Headquarters. We are teaching these future store owners how to operate their own Walls of Books!

The Perfect Gift: A Gift Card to Gottwals!

Gottwals Gift Cards are available in any denomination and can be applied to purchases of toys as well as books!

Thanksgiving Hours

All Gottwals Books locations will be closed on Thanksgiving Day. We will be open regular hours the following Friday and Saturday.

Did You Know…?

In addition to stocking a variety of toys in each store, Gottwals Books can order any toy currently available from Melissa & Doug. It’s the same great prices and no shipping expense! M&D products include classic wooden toys, pop-beads, stuffed animals, puzzles, color & paint sets, learning toys, play-kitchen items, and more.

Toy of the Week

Jumbo Cardboard Blocks: $24.97

Very young builders will love these sturdy, cardboard building blocks because they are lightweight yet durable! This 24-piece set features three sizes of “bricks” for constructive imaginative play. Made of premium, extra-thick cardboard for strength, they are easy to assemble and feature a wipe-clean surface. The red blocks hold up to 150 lbs!
